bug.author: gagandaroach
bug.description:
Describe the bug Last cell in notebook "Check best model output with the input image and label" does not execute. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Run Spleen Segmentation 3d Lightning Notebook cell produces error:
RuntimeError: Input type (torch.cuda.FloatTensor) and weight type (torch.FloatTensor) should be the same
Expected behavior Model should successfully be evaluated Screenshots Identified by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/benjamin-gorman>@benjamin-gorman</denchmark-link> in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Project-MONAI/MONAI/blob/80e2976573a9dff92fd5cd41d830b606a2e956b0/examples/notebooks/spleen_segmentation_3d_lightning.ipynb>https://github.com/Project-MONAI/MONAI/blob/80e2976573a9dff92fd5cd41d830b606a2e956b0/examples/notebooks/spleen_segmentation_3d_lightning.ipynb</denchmark-link>
Environment (please complete the following information): I reproduced the bug on
OS: Debian Buster Python version: 3.8.3 MONAI version: master CUDA/cuDNN version: 11.0 GPU models and configuration: GTX 1080TI
Additional context Adding PR fix

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marksgraham>@marksgraham</denchmark-link> , could you please help double confirm and review Gagan's PR for this issue? Thanks in advance.
